dcterms:description: A survey study measuring the awareness of and attitudes toward open access, open peer review, and altmetrics among contributors to Spanish scholarly journals.
dcterms:title: Survey on Open Access, Open Peer Review, and Altmetrics
mls:task: Analyzing perceptions of Open Peer Review
